Title: Eddie
Writer: Steve Zacharias (story), Jeff Buhai (story), Jon Connolly (story), David Loucka (story), Jon Connolly (screenplay), David Loucka (screenplay), Eric Champnella (screenplay), Keith Mitchell (screenplay), Steve Zacharias (screenplay), Jeff Buhai (screenplay)
Actors: Whoopi Goldberg, Frank Langella, Dennis Farina, Richard Jenkins
Plot: Coincidences lead to the NBA team, New York Knicks, gets it's loudest fan, Eddie W.Goldberg, as coach. Season victory?Let us see what happens.
